top.title: Divide strings and arrays with ease
top.description: A lightweight utility library for dividing strings and arrays in multiple ways

stringDivision.title: String Division
stringDivision.description: Divide strings by index positions or character delimiters with a simple API.

arrayProcessing.title: Array Processing
arrayProcessing.description: Process arrays of strings with the same intuitive interface.

nestedArray.title: Nested Array
nestedArray.description: Handle complex data structures with support for nested arrays.

flexibleOutput.title: Flexible Output
flexibleOutput.description: Get results as arrays or use destructuring for individual variables.

flatteningOption.title: Flattening Option
flatteningOption.description: Simplify results with the flatten option to get a single-level array.

mixedDelimiters.title: Mixed Delimiters
mixedDelimiters.description: Combine index positions and character delimiters in the same operation.

description.divider: Returns an string array or nested string array of divided strings or arrays.
description.dividerFirst: Returns the first part of the divided string.
description.dividerLast: Returns the last part of the divided string.
description.dividerLoop: Divides the input into equal-sized chunks by the given number. Useful for fixed-width slicing.

parameters.title: Parameters
parameters.size: The size (number of characters) for each chunk. Must be a positive integer.

options.title: Options
options.flatten: Boolean - When true, flattens the result into a single array
options.trim: Boolean - When true, trims whitespace from each divided segment
options.excludeEmpty: Boolean - When true, excludes empty segments from the result

playground.title: Playground
playground.description: Test the library in a live environment.
